data.expected_result: The game and sounds from it are shared to the other user.
data.short_description: Discord auto-restarts (Ctrl+R style) when Pharaoh is selected as window share
data.steps_to_repro: - NOTE: Related to widescreen patches for the game, DM me for link to get it. - Load Pharaoh+Cleopatra. - Put the game into Windowed Mode (not a requirement, makes it easier to reproduce the bug). - Start a screenshare with someone you know. - Select "application window" and click Pharaoh+Cleopatra.
